articles.title: Netflix subscribers can access hidden upgrade to their favourite shows - Daily Mail
articles.description: A Netflix upgrade allows viewers to activate a sound quality upgrade on hundreds of shows. But it's only available to its highest-paying subscribers - here's how to check if that's you.

articles.title: Two children among 17 people killed after fire at Jakarta fuel storage depot - The Guardian
articles.description: Another 60 people injured and hundreds evacuated after fire at Pertamina’s Plumpang depot
articles.content:
At least 17 people including two children have died after a fuel storage depot fire in Jakarta.

articles.title: SpaceX capsule delivers latest four-member crew to International Space Station - Reuters
articles.description: A SpaceX Crew Dragon capsule arrived safely at the International Space Station (ISS) after a brief delay early on Friday, carrying two U.S. astronauts, a Russian cosmonaut and a United Arab Emirates astronaut on a six-month science mission.
